metadata.title: CVE-2022-1441 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: MP4Box is a component of GPAC-2.0.0, which is a widely-used third-partypackage on RPM Fusion. When MP4Box tries to parse a MP4 file, it calls thefunction `diST_box_read()` to read from video. In this function, itallocates a buffer `str` with fixed length. However, content read from `bs`is controllable by user, so is the length, which causes a buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
